subject: Economic Conditions and Trends
World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Polls and Public Opinion
Population
Soccer
Race and Ethnicity
lead_paragraph: In a nation with a huge black and mixed-race population, 67 percent of the fans identified themselves as white and 90 percent as coming from Brazil’s top economic classes.
